ctu_text: ", "exclusions_md": "", "detailedDescription": [{"type": "paragraph", "children": [{"text": "The \u2018Chief Minister\u2019s College Students Rehabilitation Scheme (CMCSRS)' implemented by the Directorate of University & Higher Education, Govt. of Manipur aims at providing the required educational facilities to the displaced and affected undergraduate students because of the prevailing social unrest in the state. This scheme is initiated to enable such students to continue with their education without interruption.
